channel.title: All weapons train Strength and defence at the same time
channel.description: On DreamScape [PI] source scimitars train strength and defence if you are on combat style slash, lunge and block. How can i fix this?

item.title: All weapons train Strength and defence at the same time
item.dc:creator: @h3rbl0re h3rbl0re
item.description:
@h3rbl0re wrote:

Bump. Still need help.

Read full topic
item.source: All weapons train Strength and defence at the same time

item.title: All weapons train Strength and defence at the same time
item.dc:creator: @frozon566 frozon566
item.description:
@frozon566 wrote:

well first of all if someone tries to help you e.g.

Repu:

Normally in the combat assistant class there is a switch which deals with the attack types and xp gained you should play around with them.

don’t just ignore them, secondly technically your not allowed to just ask for help without first explaining what you did to try and help yourself first, so, if you havn’t tried Repu’s idea start there and if you havnt try using the search option on various rsps forums like r-s rl and here, also google is your friend.

Read full topic
